p: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which was first reported in Wuhan, Hubei province, China, toward the end of 2019, swiftly spread around the globe and became a major pandemic [ 1]. It is caused by the virus severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), the seventh coronavirus that is known to cause disease in humans [ 2].
